name: AI for Creatives
topic:
Book Topic: AI for Creatives: Harnessing Artificial Intelligence to Supercharge Your Art, Writing, and Ideas
Description:
A beginner-friendly guide for artists, writers, and creatives looking to understand how AI tools can amplify their work. From generating ideas to automating tasks, this book walks you through real-world use cases of AI in creative industries.
